anya-e1208n:281: Tathā na sevetha na tassa doso;
anya-e1208n:284: Na tassa doso na sukhaṁ vajeyya,
anya-e1208n:289: Na tassa doso ta labhe tikicchaṁ,
anya-e1208n:476: Medhāya nando thiravāci kheme; (Kavināma gabbha cakkaṁ)
anya-e1208n:479: Dāyato vasato na’nusantāsassa hitesino; (Gāthaddhavisaya paṭiloma yamakaṁ)
anya-e1208n:482: Sakāyanā’nāya’kāsa vāma nā ga ganā’mavā; (Sabbato bhadda bandhanaṁ)
anya-e1208n:491: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedhabrāhmaṇāpadānaparidīpo.
anya-e1208n:504: Sambuddho so itipi arahaṁ tyādinā’bbhuggataṁ taṁ,
anya-e1208n:518: Abbhuggantvā atha himavatā so sumedho tapassi
anya-e1208n:519: Gacchaṁ tesaṁ upari nabhasā vākacīraṁ dhunanno,
anya-e1208n:536: Sajjetuṁ te sapadi muditā sādhavo tassa’daṁsu; ()
anya-e1208n:566: Sambuddhoyaṁ vajatu iti me dīgharattaṁ hitāya; ()
anya-e1208n:573: Sutvā gāthāpadampi na me bhāriyaṁ saṁkilese
anya-e1208n:596: Patvā bodhiṁ ahamiva siyā gotamo nāma buddho; ()
anya-e1208n:598: Tumhe sampassatha iti imaṁ tāpasaṁ saṅghamajjhe
anya-e1208n:605: Bimbā bimbā dharavati piyā hema bimbā bhirāmā
anya-e1208n:613: Assattho te vijayaviṭapī tvañca kho gotamavho
anya-e1208n:615: Pāyāsaggaṁ parivisiya bho tvaṁ sujātāya dinnaṁ
anya-e1208n:616: Bodhiṁ bujjhissasi iti dhuvaṁ bodhimūle nisajja; ()
anya-e1208n:633: Rammaṁ rammaṁ mahīya jaṭilaṁ pupphamuṭṭhīhi katvā
anya-e1208n:638: Tamhā ṭhānā gatasati jane sannisinnassa tassa
anya-e1208n:651: Āvajjesi kati iti sudhī dhammadhātuṁ sahetuṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:656: Nibbinno mā bhavi’ti paṭhamaṁ pāramiṁ’dhiṭṭhahi so; ()
anya-e1208n:671: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi tvamiti matimā pāramiṁ so catutthiṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:694: Sītattaṁ sampharati hi samaṁ vārinā bhāvayeni,
anya-e1208n:696: Ajjhiṭṭhāsi samuti navamiṁ pāramiṁ metta citto; ()
anya-e1208n:699: Majjhattā’yaṁ vasumativadhū hoti dukkhe sukheka vā,
anya-e1208n:700: Evaṁ bho tvaṁ bhava samatulāsantibho’pekkha ko’ti
anya-e1208n:713: Nikkaṅkhā te punapi nagarā nāgarā taṁ upecca
anya-e1208n:718: Mā te rogo bhavi paṭibhayaṁ mā bhavi chambhitattaṁ
anya-e1208n:724: Bodhātvo himavati sakaṁ assamaṁ tāpaso so,
anya-e1208n:742: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jitavaṁsadīpe dūrenidāne sumedha tāpasassa mūlapaṇiṭhānaṭṭhapanapavatti paridīpo dutiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1037: Dve sīvali ñca samaṇīsu varā surāmā; ()
anya-e1208n:1203: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatitā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe dūrenidāne bodhisattassa sesapaṇidhātaṭṭhapana pavatti paridīpo tatiyo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1333: Pabbajjituṁ sapariso pavanaṁ jagāma; () (Soṇapaṇḍitacariyaṁ; Iti nekkhamma pārami;)
anya-e1208n:1343: Paññāpajāpatipati riputo mumoca; () (Mahosadhacariyaṁ iti paññā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1363: Khantiṁ pavattayi manappitakhantimetto; () (Dhammapāla cariyaṁ; Iti khantipāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1398: Daḷhaṁ adhiṭṭhitavataṁ vata nojahāsi; () (Temiyacariyaṁ; Iti adhiṭṭhāna pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1408: Mettāya samphari samaṁ paribhāvitāya; () (Ekarājacariyaṁ; Iti mettā pāramī;)
anya-e1208n:1413: Veraṁ averamanupecca rarakkhu’pekkhaṁ; () (Lomahaṁsacariyaṁ; Iti upekkhāka pakāramiṁ)
anya-e1208n:1454: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe durenidāne pāramidhammābhisaṅkharaṇa pavatti paridīpo catuttho saggo.
anya-e1208n:1498: Nisajjo paripāsāde so rājā ekadā raho,
anya-e1208n:1586: Yasmā akālo buddhānaṁ tasmā kālaṁ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1589: Jāyanti jambudīpasmiṁ tasmā dīpaṁ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1592: Jāyare majjhime dese tasmādesaṁ vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1595: Khantiye brāhmaṇe buddhā kulaṁ tasmā vipassi so; ()
anya-e1208n:1607: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānatidāne jinavaṁsadīpe durenidāne vessantaracariyappabhutidevārādhanā pavatti paridīpo pañcamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:1891: Rañño kathesi supinaṁ atha so narindo,
anya-e1208n:2109: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidurenidāne pacchimabhavika mahābodhi sattuppatti pavattiparidīpo chaṭṭhosaggo.
anya-e1208n:2359: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandananidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidūrenidāne vividhapubbanimittapātubhāvappavatti paridipo. Sattamosaggo.
anya-e1208n:2899: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidūrenidāne lakkhaṇapaṭiggahaṇa kumārasambharaṇādi pavatti paridipo aṭṭhamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:3150: Iti mbedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidūrenidāne pāṇiggahamaṅakgalussavapavattiparidīpo. Navamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:3330: Yathariva gaṇikaṁ taṁ kañjaniṁ so janindo
anya-e1208n:3390: Iti varamati sutvā tāya gāthaṁ sugītaṁ
anya-e1208n:3485: Alamiti mama vāso handa nikkhamma tamhā
anya-e1208n:3574: Savisamiva pibanto taṁ tuvaṁ ko’si pucchi,
anya-e1208n:3630: Nabhasi khipi sikhaṁ taṁ iccadhiṭṭhāya dhīro
anya-e1208n:3667: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidūre nidāne mahābhinikkhamana pavattiparidīpo dasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:3824: Nā go siyā paṭhaminimujjanaṁ ka re
anya-e1208n:3856: Mā kāhase sakha iti dukkaraṁ kharaṁ
anya-e1208n:3977: Vāsaṁ akā vasi mukhato ca nāsato
anya-e1208n:4223: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hakayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidurenidāne mahābodhisattassa mahā padhānānuyogappavattiparidīpo ekādasamosaggo.
anya-e1208n:4739: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavakijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidūre nidāne devaputta mārabala viddhaṁsana pavattiparidīpo dvādasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:4990: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe avidure nidāne pubbenivāsañāṇadibbacakkhuñāṇādhigama pavattiparidīpo terasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:5241_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe
anya-e1208n:5241_1: avidure nidāne mahā bodhisattassa ariyamaggañāṇābhisambodhi samadhigama pavattiparidīpo cuddasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:5451: Kiṁ tāta kiṁ tāta kimettha jhāyasi
anya-e1208n:5452: Ko te paro kena parājito tuvaṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:5461: Dassāma vo passatha tāta no balaṁ
anya-e1208n:5553: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavato sattasattāhavitikkamappavatti paridīpo paṇṇarasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:5556: Vikkhāletvā bhagavati mukhaṁ tasmiṁ nisinne sati,
anya-e1208n:5557: Vāṇijjatthaṁ nija janapadā dve bhātikāka vāṇijā
anya-e1208n:5562: Bhante tumhe anubhavatha no bhikkhaṁ paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n:5565: Sabbe buddhā nahi karatalambhojesu gaṇhanti kho
anya-e1208n:5570: Ekaṁ katvā samuti caturo patte adhiṭṭhāya te
anya-e1208n:5580: Patvā tesaṁ janapadamubho pakkhippa tā dhātuyo
anya-e1208n:5591: Deseyyaṁ kho paṭhamamasamaṁ dhammaṁ imaṁ duddasaṁ,
anya-e1208n:5602: Ācikkhitvā vimati matarī saññāya taṁ dūrato
anya-e1208n:5603: Nibbinditvā katika makaruṁ vaggā samaggā vasī; ()
anya-e1208n:5605: Ñatvā tesaṁ manasi vikatiṁ odissakaṁ samphari
anya-e1208n:5606: Mettaṁ cittaṁ narahari tato phuṭṭhāsamānā vasī,
anya-e1208n:5633: Vassāna’nte pahiṇi muni te bhikkhu disācārikaṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:5648: Rañño vācaṁ sumariya puraṁ rājaggahaṁ pāvisi; ()
anya-e1208n:5655: Bhetvā diṭṭhiṁ ciraparicitaṁ te kassapādī vasī
anya-e1208n:5656: Disvā rājā bhagavati tadā dhammaṁcarante tahiṁ,
anya-e1208n:5671: Uṇhākāraṁ janayi’ti tadā hutvā navo māṇavo,
anya-e1208n:5690: Āramaṁ taṁ parama ruciraṁ satthā paṭiggaṇhiya
anya-e1208n:5692: Tasmiṁ kāle paramamamataṁ ye daḷhamittā ubho
anya-e1208n:5708: Sutvā dhammaṁ adhigami vasī taṁ dhammasenāpatī; ()
anya-e1208n:5710: Dhammassāmī karahaci ubho te sāvakānaṁ mamaṁ
anya-e1208n:5711: Aggaṁ bhaddaṁ yugamiti ime pabyākarotto munī,
anya-e1208n:5716: Buddho hutvā padahiya ciraṁ nissāya rājaggahaṁ,
anya-e1208n:5737: Evaṁ vatvā kapuna saparisaṁ sokāphadāyiṁ tahiṁ
anya-e1208n:5751: Gantuṁ kālo’yamiti adhunā so kāludāyi vasī,
anya-e1208n:5758: Sāyaṁka pāto ahani vivaṭā sabbādisā pākaṭā; ()
anya-e1208n:5763: Dāvaggī te lavamapi manotāpāya vattanti kiṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:5787: Haṁsasseṇika sirasi vajato te bhuyate kiṅkiṇi-
anya-e1208n:5801: Jiṇṇo vuddho mamihapahiṇi tvaṁ daṭṭhukāmo pitā,
anya-e1208n:5815: Taṁ bhuñjanto divasadivase so yojanaṁ yojanaṁ
anya-e1208n:5820: Nānuppatte bhagavati puraṁ no ñātiseṭṭhaṁ kuhiṁ
anya-e1208n:5833: Nissoko so muni parihari sokandhakāraṁ pitu; ()
anya-e1208n:5838: Tumhegantvā paṇamatha jinaṁ vo piṭṭhitāhomै no; ()
anya-e1208n:5858: Vassaṁ vassi nijanakharuciṁ tesaṁ samāje sati; ()
anya-e1208n:5892: Gantvā sīghaṁ khaḷitavacatā putto mahārāja te
anya-e1208n:5910: Uttiṭṭhādiṁ avadi kasugamaṁ gāthaṁ ṭhito vīthiyaṁ
anya-e1208n:5926: Rājā saṅghaṁ sugatapamukhaṁ khajjena bhojjena ca,
anya-e1208n:5938: Taṁ kamaṁ daṭṭhuṁ nanupavisatī’tve’vaṁ vadantī ṭhitā; ()
anya-e1208n:5966: Sīghaṁ jālaṁ vivariya thiyā vīthiṁ vilokentiyā,
anya-e1208n:5968: Pattaṁ bhante haratha vacanaṁ bhatyā na taṁ vyākari; ()
anya-e1208n:5983: Eso tuyhaṁ naraharika pitā iccākaha pakassāhi naṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:5988: Yācassū’ti pahiṇi pituno ñattaṁ dhanaṁ pettikaṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:5995: Dāyajjaṁ me samaṇa dadataṁ atthodhanenā’ti me
anya-e1208n:6012: Sutvā kasuttaṁ puna taditaraṁ sikkhāgarūnaṁ garu-
anya-e1208n:6020: Rañño datvā varamati varaṁ bhuttāsano āsanā-
anya-e1208n:6040: Buddhatthaṁ so gahapati mahāmagge samagge divā-
anya-e1208n:6052: Tesaṁ sīsaharañjalihi mahito sutvāna taṁ sāsanaṁ
anya-e1208n:6054: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakala kavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santikeka nidāne bhagavato pakiṇṇaka caritappavatti paridīpo soḷasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:6292: Yo sadātiya sadā kama taṁ sadā,
anya-e1208n:6304: Vanī janaṁ jetavane vinento; () (Caturakkharika citta yamakaṁ;)
anya-e1208n:6305: Iti medhānandābhidhānanayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santike nidāne jetavana vihārālaṅkāra paridīpo sattarasamo saggo.
anya-e1208n:6724: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santike nidāne pañjavidhabuddhakicca paridīpo aṭṭhārasamoka saggo.
anya-e1208n:6839: Yatana cha phassa cha vedanāti ceko; ()
anya-e1208n:6975: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santike nidāne bhagavato arahantināmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekūnavīsatimoka saggo.
anya-e1208n:7071_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe
anya-e1208n:7071_1: santikeka nidāne bhagavato kasammāsambuddhoti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo vīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7505_0: Iti medhānandābhidhānenayatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe
anya-e1208n:7505_1: santike nidāne bhagavato vijjācaraṇa sampannoti nāmapaññattiyāabhidheya paridīpo ekavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7506: Taṁkho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā sugatoti.
anya-e1208n:7812: Tena so bhuvanattaye sugato siyāti suvissuto; ()
anya-e1208n:7817: Nātho sammā gato tato so sugato; ()
anya-e1208n:7818: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatināna viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santikeka nidāne bhagavato sutagoti paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo. Bāvīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:7819: Taṁkho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato. Itipiso bhagavā lokavidūti.
anya-e1208n:7970: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavatolokavidūti nāmapaññattiyā abhidheyaparidīpo tevīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n:7971: Taṁkho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi so bhagavā anuttaro purisadammasārathīti.
anya-e1208n:8127_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā varacite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe
anya-e1208n:8127_1: santikenidāne bhagavato anuttaro purisadammasārathīti nāma paññattiyā abhidheya paridīpo catubbīsatimosaggo.
anya-e1208n:8128: Taṁkho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇekitti saddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā satthā devamanussānaṁti.
anya-e1208n:8142: Sabrahmaṁ sanarāmaraṁ sasamaṇaṁ sabrāhmaṇaṁ yohi so
anya-e1208n:8147: Sattānaṁ tasasate vihiṁsati dhiyā siddhatthasāro tato
anya-e1208n:8154: Taṁkho panabhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁkalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipiso bhagavā buddhoti.
anya-e1208n:8159: Patto ñāṇabalesu pāpuṇi vasībhāvaṁ sayamabhuka sayaṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:8161: Bodhetā’ti pajāya nibbacanato saccāni so bujjhitā
anya-e1208n:8163: Matyā bujjhanasattiyā mahatiyā yasmā samaṅakgī tato
anya-e1208n:8178: Buddhambhojatibhānano hī bhagavā sāmaṁ pabuddho yato
anya-e1208n:8200_0: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe
anya-e1208n:8200_1: santikenidāne satthādevamanussānaṁ buddhoti nāmapaññattīnaṁ abhidheya paridīpo pañcavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:8201: Taṁkho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇe kittisaddo abbhuggato itipi sobhagavā bhagavāti.
anya-e1208n:8446: Na devatāhi ca nana yena kenaci racitaṁ,
anya-e1208n:8639: Mataṁ so pibanto vamī te ca bhāge; ()
anya-e1208n:8705: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānanda dānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavā’tināmapaññattiyā abhidheyaparidīpo chabbīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:8780: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santikenidāte navannamarahādiguṇānaṁ saṅkhepanayaparidīpo
anya-e1208n:9090: Na ca taṁ paṭivijjhi neva yāci
anya-e1208n:9123: Appossukko samāno viharatu kalimā ho timāsaccayena
anya-e1208n:9131: Loko sokandhakāre paripati janito bhiṁsano lomahaṁso; ()
anya-e1208n:9132: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santike nidāne bhagavato āyusaṅkhārossajjana pavatti paridīpo aṭṭhavīsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:9134: Yenā’nando vasati bhagavā tena gantvā nisinno
anya-e1208n:9136: Bhante sukkhāsati ca elitā hiṁsano lomahaṁso
anya-e1208n:9149: Gabbhokkanto bhacati ca yadā sampajāno satova
anya-e1208n:9152: Ete dhammā samaṇa mahato bhumicālassa hetu; ()
anya-e1208n:9169: Apposasukekā tvamiha kalimā hohi māsehi tīhi
anya-e1208n:9179: Sambodhiṁ tvaṁ yadi bhagavato saddahanto’si kasmā
anya-e1208n:9181: Tasmiṁ tasmiṁ sati bhagavatā ka yamāne nimitte
anya-e1208n:9184: Yāceyyāsi yadi dasabalaṁ ce paṭikkhippa vācā
anya-e1208n:9186: Naṇvā’kkhāto samaṇa paṭigacceva me saṅkhataṁ yaṁ
anya-e1208n:9187: Jātaṁ bhūtaṁ avipariṇataṁ taṁ kuto’ pe’ttha labbhā; ()
anya-e1208n:9191: Yāsā vācā yathariva chiyāmuttakhāṇo tathā taṁ
anya-e1208n:9205: Yete dhammā sayamadhigatā desitā sādhukaṁ vo,
anya-e1208n:9222: Oloketvā ida mavaca me pacchimaṁ dassana’nti; ()
anya-e1208n:9229: Tisso sikkhā pariharatha vo sādhukaṁ bhikkhave’ti
anya-e1208n:9239: Eso dhammo bhavati vinayo sāsanaṁ satthu cedaṁ
anya-e1208n:9240: Abbhaññātaṁ vata bhagavato sammukhā me sutanti,
anya-e1208n:9241: Sakkhīkatvā yadi vadati maṁ bhikkhave koci bhikkhu
anya-e1208n:9252: Yvābhiññāto paṭibalataro bhikkhu vā sammukhā me
anya-e1208n:9296: Yaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ narahari tahiṁ vissamatto nisajja,
anya-e1208n:9307: Sakkā bhante savati kakudhāsindhu gattāni sīkiṁ
anya-e1208n:9310: Evaṁ vutte puna bhagavatā codito pattahattho
anya-e1208n:9328: Datvā buddhaṁ saraṇa magamā sāṭakaṁ siṅgīvaṇṇaṁ; ()
anya-e1208n:9341: Dve me laddhā samasamaphalā piṇḍapātā visiṭṭhā,
anya-e1208n:9343: Sse’vaṁ vatvā pariharatu tañcāha me accayena; ()
anya-e1208n:9372: Yo kho dhammaṁ carati samaṇo’ pāsako vā’nudhammaṁ
anya-e1208n:9373: Bhatyā so maṁ paramavidhānā kamānaye pūjayeti; ()
anya-e1208n:9385: Kandantīnaṁ pakiriya sake kesapāse ca bāhā
anya-e1208n:9426: Theraṁ mākhovilapi ala mānanda māsoci hevaṁ,
anya-e1208n:9433: Ātāpī so tvamasi nipapako hesi khīṇāsavoti; ()
anya-e1208n:9451: Rājā hutvā cira manubhaviṁ dhammiko dhammarājā,
anya-e1208n:9462: Uyyānaṁ te pavisiya tadā mallaputtā ca mallā
anya-e1208n:9475: Okāsaṁ me dadatha samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pucchanāya
anya-e1208n:9477: Vutte satthā kilamati alaṁhāvuso mā vihaññi
anya-e1208n:9490: Paññatto yo bhavati vinayo desito yoca dhammo
anya-e1208n:9491: So vo satthā paramasaraṇo’tyā’ha me accayena,
anya-e1208n:9495: Paccakkho no bhavi dasabalo pucchituṁ sammukhā taṁ
anya-e1208n:9498: Saṅghe magge vimati yadivo bhikkhave pucchathāti; ()
anya-e1208n:9500: Yasmā khandhe pajahati jino bhikkhave bhandadāni
anya-e1208n:9510: Taṁ taṁ jhānaṁ muni paṭisamāpajjamāno nirodhā
anya-e1208n:9534: Itimedhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadānanidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santike nidāne tathāgata parinibbānappavatti paridīpo ekūnatiṁsatimo saggo.
anya-e1208n:9535: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā brahmāsahampati imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9539: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānāsakko devānamindo imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9542: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā anuruddho imā gāthāyo abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9547: Parinibbute bhagavati sahaparinibbānā āyasmā ānando imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi.
anya-e1208n:9827: Bhatyā punappuna mimaṁ sarataṁ sataṁ bho,
anya-e1208n:9905: Iti medhānandābhidhānena yatinā viracite sakalakavijana hadayānandadāna nidāne jinavaṁsadīpe santikenidāne bhagavato dhātuparinibbānappavattiparidīpo tiṁsatimosaggo.
